129.237.201.95|the ip address of this computer|thisip
129.237.201.44|the ip address of the Mac computer used for releases|macip
specify|the username to log into the remote machine with|username
5-winlin|the base string for Windows and Linux Install4j project files|winlinbase
5-mac|the base string for Mac Install4j project files|macbase
../web_launch|the relative path to the web launch directory on the local machine|intdirlocal
../web_launch_ext|the relative path to the external web launch directory on the local machine|extdirlocal
web_launch|the relative path to the web launch directory on the Mac machine|intdirmac
web_launch_ext|the relative path to the external web launch directory on the Mac machine|extdirmac
../workspace/SpecifyTrunk-sf/packaging|the relative path to the trunk projects on the local machine|trunkdirlocal
Documents/workspace/SpecifyTrunk-sf/packaging|the relative path to the trunk projects on the Mac machine|trunkdirmac
../workspace/Specify_6202-sf/packaging|the relative path to the branch projects on the local machine|branchdirlocal
Documents/workspace/Specify_6202-sf/packaging|the relative path to the branch projects on the Mac machine|branchdirmac
specify6-prod.nhm.ku.edu|the value (with no http prefix) of the internal update server|intserver
specifysoftware.org|the value (with no http prefix) of the production server|extserver
../install4j5/bin|the relative path from configure_environment.sh to the local install4j bin folder|i4jlocal
/Applications/install4j5/bin|the absolute path to the remote install4j bin folder on the mac|i4jmac
../Install4JUpdater/bin|the relative path from this script up to and including the bin directory of the Install4j updater application|i4jU
//huxley/specify6/SpecifyAlphaInstallers|the absolute path of the backup folder on the backup server|backupserver
update.specifysoftware.org/updates.xml|the update address of the plain public release|addr_p_pub
update.specifysoftware.org/updates-embed.xml|the update address of the embedded public release|addr_e_pub
specify6-prod.nhm.ku.edu/spinternal/trunk/updates.xml|the update address of the plain internal Trunk release|addr_p_tr
specify6-prod.nhm.ku.edu/spinternal/trunk/updates-embed.xml|the update address of the embedded internal Trunk release|addr_e_tr
specify6-prod.nhm.ku.edu/spinternal/branch/updates.xml|the update address of the plain internal Branch release|addr_p_br
specify6-prod.nhm.ku.edu/spinternal/branch/updates-embed.xml|the update address of the embedded internal Branch release|addr_e_br
1|the on-off switch for copying in the log4j property file into the source before the ant build|log4j_switch
